name: Chess Mess (pavelivanov)
description:
A chess based puzzle game with the goal of KEEPING ALIVE the King!

Made for Ludum Dare 46 compo in 48 hours.

If you aren't familiar with basic chess movement rules, I advise you search it up, the game doesn't teach you that. 

The controls are pretty self explanatory, read the dialog if to understand it if you don't want to figure it out yourself. It's not complicated tho.
